SELECT A.compCd, A.compNm, A.compNo, A.compOwner, A.compMajor, A.compPhone, A.compEmail, A.compAddr, A.compType, A.compPart, A.remarks, A.issueId, F.fileUrl, CASE WHEN A.flagYn = 'Y' THEN "유효" ELSE "무효" END flagYn FROM ( SELECT * FROM tblCompany ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tableKey, fileUrl FROM tblFiles F1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(fileSeq) maxFileSeq FROM tblFiles WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND tableNm = "tblCompany" GROUP BY tableNm, tableKey ) F2 ON F1.fileSeq = F2.maxFileSeq ) F ON F.tableKey = A.compCd
WHERE A.compNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findCompNm}, '%')
ORDER BY A.compNm ASC

SELECT compCd, compNm, compNo, compOwner, compMajor, compPhone, compEmail, compAddr, compType, compPart, remarks, flagYn, regDt, issueDt, issueId FROM ( SELECT * FROM tblCompany WHERE compCd = #{compCd} ) A
